function.name: telegram_bot
function.description: Complete Telegram Bot API access. Send messages (text, photos, documents, videos, locations), read updates, edit/delete messages, polls. Free and unlimited. Requires TELEGRAM_BOT_TOKEN.

chat_id.description: Chat ID (user ID, group ID, or channel username @channelname). Required for send/edit/delete operations. Use get_updates to find chat IDs.

text.description: Message text for send_message, edit_message. Max 4096 characters. Supports Markdown/HTML.

photo.description: Photo URL or file_id for send_photo

document.description: Document URL or file_id for send_document

video.description: Video URL or file_id for send_video

message_id.description: Message ID for edit_message, delete_message operations

question.description: Poll question for send_poll. Max 300 characters.

options.description: Poll options array for send_poll (2-10 options, each max 100 chars)

is_anonymous.description: Poll anonymity for send_poll. Default: true

allows_multiple_answers.description: Allow multiple answers in poll. Default: false

offset.description: Update offset for get_updates. Use last update_id + 1 to acknowledge.

limit.description: Max updates to retrieve for get_updates. Default: 20, max: 100

timeout.description: Long polling timeout for get_updates (seconds). Default: 0 (short polling), max: 50
